title: Scream Quietly
description: A dark, chilling Psychological Crime Thriller for fans of Gillian Flynn, S. J. Watson, Elizabeth Haynes and Chevy Stevens. What would you do if you couldn't trust your own memory? What if everything you believe is a lie? When your life is in danger and there is only one way out there is nobody you can trust, not even yourself. After a car crash Marieke is plagued by memories of events she can't trust ever happened. During therapy she begins to uncover a prior existence, one which she'd tried so desperately to hide from herself. When she realises that the man she married is hiding something much worse she discovers that the past is not so far away after all. Leaving her with a decision which results in devastating consequences.
author: Louise Mullins
